<author>Heidrich, Felipe Etchegaray, and Ernesto Redondo.</author> <year>2014.</year> <title>“Interacción y Movimiento En El Análisis Visual de Proyectos Arquitectónicos Académicos.”</title> In <container-title>Proceedings of the XVIII Conference of the Iberoamerican Society of Digital Graphics - SIGraDi: Design in Freedom.</container-title> <collection-title>Proceedings of the XVIII Conference of the Iberoamerican Society of Digital Graphics - SIGraDi: Design in Freedom.</collection-title> <publisher>Editora Edgard Blücher.</publisher> <DOI>https://doi.org/10.5151/despro-sigradi2014-0029.</DOI>
<author>MATOS, Sónia.</author> <year>2014.</year> <title>“Here We Don’t Speak, Here We Whistle: Designing a Language Support System for the Silbo Gomero.”</title> In <container-title>Design Frontiers: Territories, Concepts, Technologies [=ICDHS 2012 - 8th Conference of the International Committee for Design History & Design Studies].</container-title> <collection-title>Design Frontiers: Territories, Concepts, Technologies [=ICDHS 2012 - 8th Conference of the International Committee for Design History & Design Studies].</collection-title> <publisher>Editora Edgard Blücher.</publisher> <DOI>https://doi.org/10.5151/design-icdhs-046.</DOI>
